IKDTree

Defines an interface for manipulating a KD Tree.

Functions
AddPoint
virtual void AddPoint(
Caustic::Vector3 &vec,
void *data
) = 0

Adds a point to our KD tree

Parameters
vec
Caustic::Vector3&

point to add to tree

data
void*

user data to associate with the point. This data is saved in the tree along with the point. During calls to FindPoint this data will be returned to the client.

FindPoint
virtual bool FindPoint(
Caustic::Vector3 &vec,
std::function<bool(void *data)> comparator,
void **data
) = 0

Checks if the specified point is in the tree

Parameters
vec
Caustic::Vector3&

point to find

comparator
std::function<bool(void *data)>

user defined comparison function

data
void**

user data associated with found point

Returns

True if point is found in tree. False otherwise.
